subject: VAM PRO Compatibility
description_text:
Good evening

I have the Plus X Control Box!, is it possible to connect the VAM PRO to it?

Many thanks
Regards
José Alves

conversations.body_text: I forgot to mention, I also have the old Pro Plus pedals.     Thank you
Hi José Alves,    Yes, you can connect both the Pro Plus pedals and the VAM PRO to the Plus X Control Box.

Awesome, thank you so much!

On Thu, Sep 11, 2025 at 8:11 AM service@simsonn.com
